pages.text: A sylladex with a furnace included! Requires the equivalent of 10 seconds of smelting to extract an item.$(br)As a bonus, items that can be smelted will be, at the full cost of smelting the stack.$(br)Just be careful with furnace fuels, these are non-refundable.
Combine any modus card and a Furnace in a Punch Designix.
